name: Squba-Diver
description:
You are a scuba-diver who has broken his submarine. Now you have to find all the missing parts of submarine to get it working again. You have to battle dangerous and gigantic sharks, squids, and other water animals to get the parts. All the best for your Adventure!

                                                             ----CONTROLS-----

~Arrow Keys for Navigation.

~Space to Shoot.

                                                           ----HOW TO PLAY?-----

1. Find all the 5 missing parts of the submarine.

2.Don't let your oxygen fall to zero.

3. You can shoot darker walls to find secret places.

This is my first ever game jam :)

Please rate this game and give your feedback/suggestion.
